message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm hoping we can make a deal.  My first offer is $20,000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate you countering.  $10,000 is pretty low though - this product really is top quality.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. Can you consider $12,000? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $12,000 is cutting it very close to my bottom line.  $15,000 is my final offer â€“ I think it's a fair price for the value you're getting.
I appreciate your time and effort, but $15,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. That's my final offer.
